on reading compounds: 相思【ソウシ】mutual affection, mutual love
kun reading compounds: 思う【おもう】to think, to consider, to believe, to reckon, to think (of doing), to plan (to do), to judge, to assess, to regard, to imagine, to suppose, to dream, to expect, to look forward to, to feel, to be (in a state of mind), to desire, to want, to recall, to remember
思う存分【おもうぞんぶん】to one's heart's content
